resources.string: Ask for confirm credentials when the app goes to background
Use fingerprint option to confirm transfers

Cortez for Android is a native mobile wallet for the Tezos blockchain.

Developed in Paris by a core mobile team, this native Android app aims to bring maximum security and best user experience the Android operating system can bring to its users.

Cortez is 100% open source. Check it out at https://gitlab.com/tezos/cortez-android

Feel free to mail us by clicking on the button below.
